O'SHEA.raw_line: Uh ... Yeah?... On the way.... Yeah ...... No.Well?You're not serious?Are ya gettin' in or what?Nah thanks, they give me heartburn.A bit eager aren't ya?Coffee?And quiet as shite.Milk?Cows. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 10.Is she really necessary?You're only gone two weeks. I can handle two weeks.You're gonna miss your boat.... Left.So you're after the sarge's desk?Just wondering.Where are you stationed?And how's that working out for ya?Well you can relax, there's none of that here.I bet you haven't missed a day of work in your life.It's just a job.Lisa Nolan, doctor Jim Gleeson. Resident physician.You wouldn't have any Aspirin on ya, would ya, Jim?You're all right.Ah, no one minds.What happened?Smith's a marine psychologist or something, did I get that right?So are they dead?!Slipped.All of them? At once?Hey, Daly, Cooney about?Busy?I've warned the kids to keep out.On holiday. Leaving me up the creek.Well, remember that favour you owe me? I'm looking for some boys to help move a few things off the beach. An hours work, tops.Would you like a drink?Tomorrow's Sunday.What?She's all right. A bit uptight.I do talk to her. I talked to her all day.Go on.What is it, Paddy?No, not really.Nope.All right, tell us then.Not a bit.All right, where is it?In your bathtub?G'night, Paddy.What?What did you say?What is it?Come on down for a drink.It doesn't matter out here. No one will know.I am not. I'm sober as a judge.... Zed ... Et cetera.Course not. I'm taking Johnny's horse.Yeah, so? The horse is sober.Listen, I think we got off on the wrong foot today.Feck.Sorry.What's that? GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 26.Whoa, that last drink's gone straight to me head.Well, other places too.Just high days and holidays.Now you're talking.Wha..?I ... uh, what happened?You arrested me?!Let me out of here.We'll discuss it later.Eurgh.A what? GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 34.Hi.Is it dead?You're not what?It's a weapon.Vampiro what?She? GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 37.That's Declan Cooney's car.Cooney?!Nowhere without his keys. Do you believe in coincidences?Neither do I.Come on.When you're looking for answers you gotta go asking questions.All the lights are on.How come you're not in uniform?It suits you.Oh he's positively smashing.Uh huh. Tadhg? Irene?He's like you, he's married to his job.Shush, I'm working.Tadhg? Irene?You're something else, you know that. You should've joined the army, not the guards.I'm not talking to myself, I'm talking to you.Could you be a bit more specific?Well?Aw Jesus Cock!What killed him, Jim?A tiger?!Jesus, Paddy.What is it?OK, we're here. Here's where Cooney's car was abandoned. Here's Tadhg and Irene Murphy's house and here's where the whales washed up.I have no idea. I was hoping it would show some sort of pattern.Yeah. That thing you caught couldn't have fertilised that egg by itself, which would mean there's a male out there big enough and strong enough to knock a hole in your bathroom wall.He says a lot of things.OK, all this is on the west side of the island, right? So that would make this area its territory; which would mean it's got to be somewhere close. Somewhere with access to the waters around the west beach.What do you think?What?You gave me that look.The "I feel sorry for you" look.Yeah you did.Sure that's worse!Look, I know I'm no dandy fop, Ph. D. Smith type.I'm not a raging-- You're some character you know that. A real character. I'm a social drinker.Wait here.Hello!Just checking. Well, if you know of a better way? Hello?!Run!Lisa! Hurry!Move your arse! GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 48.If I die in here I want you to know it's all your fault!It's OK. It can't get us on dry land. Not when it's not raining, it can't.... What?The eggs are buried at the beach.Everywhere that's been, the other one's followed. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 50.It tried to eat us! And it's HUGE and looking for her ... but this will be the last place it looks.Shit.It didn't burn.I --You vicious little fu--!We need to kill it.Good man.They'll never make it across the water.Finishing each other's sentences now?Nothing. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 53.It took three of us to get that thing off me.How are you still alive?No, when that thing attacked you. You should be laid out in a box right now, but you're not. What makes you so special?You were drunk!Come on.They're like leeches, right? They feed off your blood. Well when one of them bit Paddy, it almost died, why?Exactly. If we taint our blood with booze, we're poisonous to eat.We have just one night where we have to deal with this on our own. Tomorrow, we'll be sorted. We'll get off the island, they'll nuke the beaches or whatever they do, but all we have to worry about is tonight. And it's simple. We have a lock-in. We stay out of the rain and we drink. We can't stop them coming but we can be ready.That's just the tip of the blood sucking iceberg.No, that won't work.No, no. More like planning.Listen, the only people that know about this are us and it's gotta stay that way or we'll have a panic on our hands.This will work. And I'll keep order. I won't be drinking.Thanks. Only one of us need risk it and I know these people and this island better than you. It should be me.Lisa, I'm good to no one when I drink. I know that. So do you. I can do this.Of course you can. And you'll be the best drunken Guard this country's ever seen. You'll probably get promoted.Brian, I want a table of everything Paddy had last night.Come on. Three fingers.There, that's everything.When this is over we need to talk.Paddy.Now the tainted blood. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 62.Blow. Point two.OK, now we know what we gotta do. Keep our blood alcohol levels at point two.So lets do it.Is this everyone?Father, do you mind if I say a few words?Can I have your attention please?Folks, just a quick announcement, at Maher's Tavern tonight we're having a bit of a shindig and you're all coming to join us for what will be a great night's craic!Yeah.Who needs a reason to have a laugh?What we mean to say is --What Garda Nolan means is we'd love your company. There's no point going home to a cold, empty house in weather like tonight when we'll be right across the street from here and we'll have music and craic and company -- and a FREE BAR!That's the spirit! So c'mon, it's a party and the drinks are on us!Weapons. What have we got?All right, what have you got?Right, well look sharp. You know your stations: guard each exit and don't let anyone out. Bottoms up.How much have you had?Then keep drinking.Blow. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 69.No more for you.You know as flattering as it is to hear a beautiful drunk slurring her feelings for me, now's not the time.For the craic.You're too hard on yourself.Maybe because I put years onto people. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 70.My what?Una said what? Of all the stories. Una is the biggest gossip going. You shouldn't listen to her. No one died. We just ... we didn't work out.You're grand.I didn't drink back then. No, she met someone else. It happens.A toast. From an alcoholic to a workaholic. To getting out of this alive.Patrol to Base. Patrol to Base. Come in, over.How are we doing?Great. Keep it up. Over.Jim, don't move! GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 74.You OK, Jim?WAIT! Oh Jesus Mary Mother of God.Drive! Drive!AHH, THE OTHER WAY! THE OTHER WAY!Let me drive!Get us out of here!We're gonna die!Put your foot on the clutch!BRIAN, GET THE DOOR, OPEN THE DOOR!Let it! GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 77.Grab the table.Brian, forget that help us barricade the door.That's gonna blow! Get rid of it!Nothing!Move back.Is every one all right?Is this what I'm like when I'm drunk?Folks, listen carefully. We're moving this party upstairs.It's just a precaution.You can't. No one can.No! You can't go outside!Paddy! Brian! Cop on, I'm asking ya! Now's not the time for this.No!Get back! Smith, what are you doing? Smith!Smith, listen to me. It's bigger than you think. Get back inside now! Please, I'm begging you.Smith, mate! Listen to me!Everyone, upstairs! Now!Everyone, stay calm. They can't get up here.Has anyone been bitten? You haven't been bitten because of the alcohol you've been drinking. They're allergic to drunk people. So there's no need to panic, we're safe up here. Has anyone got a mobile on them?Call the mainland. Call the Coastguard. Call whoever you can get through to. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 86.We'll be fine!We're the Gardai. Not the LAPD. An Garda Siochana will succeed not by force of arms or numbers, but on their moral authority as servants of the people.Something's not right. It can't be that hungry.Tadhg Murphy's dead!No, no, Tadhg Murphy's fine. He's at the festival on the mainland.What the hell does that mean?Grand. Ah sure what can ya do.What's your reading?What about the phones?OK, we know it does two things: it drinks blood and it breathes water. We took away one, we could take away the other.We need to keep it away from water. Dry it out somehow. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 90.There's got to be some way we can stop it, fight fire with fire.-- A death trap. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 91.Have you got the keys to your truck?I need them.Absolutely not, it's too risky. Paddy you go.No. It's too dangerous.If you get in trouble. Pull the trigger.Careful.Just get the keys and come right back. I'll do the rest.Shush!! Keep your voice down!Run very fast.Improvise. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 94.Hurry.Where is she?I need those keys.Lisa?GO!PUT YOUR LIGHTS ON!It's following me, so you get the crusher and I'll lure it into position.What is?I know.Fuck knows.I've got an idea.What's your idea?I'M THINKING--Run!Come on, you langer. Just a little closer. Move. Hey, you want me, you're going have to come across and get --Awwwwww bollocks.Enough! Piss off!You took your sweet time.Sláinte.He couldn't handle his drink.... What are you...?Jesus, you're dangerous.So do you.You know if you lived here you'd be home already.I'll need all the help I can get.Yeah.Sounds good.

LISA.raw_line: Shit!Howya. O'Shea, is it? Ciarán? We spoke on the phone. I'm Garda Nolan, Lisa.Yeah, well. Just being polite.I have a bag.Would you like a mint?Smoother than most.That'd be great, thanks.It's gorgeous, isn't it?Uhm, what kind?I'll take it black, thanks.I'm sure we can find something to do.Ta.Not a bother.Garda Nolan.Do I go...? GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 13.What makes you say that?Well, I'm not. I'd some holidays saved that needed to be taken and this posting came up and I thought sure what harm, why not? Can't hurt with the review board, you know?Dublin Central.Great. We got drugs, muggings, murders and rapes. Always on the go.You never know. It's the quiet places where all the mad shit happens. Just open a paper.What? GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 14.And should I be ashamed of that?Seatbelt. It is the law.Grand, thanks.I'd prefer it if you'd introduce me as Garda Nolan.I do.Lisa.That was quick.Two weeks.So what happened?What are those marks?They didn't beach themselves? GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 17.You, what's your name?Carry on.Watch where you're going.Hi, do you have an iron?Hi.Another time, maybe.Thanks. See you tomorrow.Oh, right. Well, I have a key so ... see you Monday then.Is everything all right?What do you want?I have work tomorrow.You're drunk. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 25.Is that so? Say the alphabet backwards for me.I hope you're not driving?You're going to ride a horse while intoxicated?Amazing, and you're in charge here.It's OK.Just your head?Do you get this drunk every night?Let's get you to bed.Grand, thanks. Do I have something to sign?How's the weather looking?Really? Are the gulls flying low or something?Temporarily.Depends what you're fishing.Widowed?The single room is fine.I'll think about it.Morning.How much does a place like this go for? I mean it's close to the beach, all mod-cons. It's perfect.Section four point one of the Public Order Act. It is an offence for any person to be present in any public place while intoxicated to such an extent as would give rise to a reasonable apprehension that the person might endanger themselves or any other in the vicinity. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 33.For your own good.Relax. You passed out before I could find your house.Garda Nolan.Hi.What is that thing?And this attacked you?What's that in its mouth?That's not a tongue.That's disgusting.Do you reckon those things had anything to do with those dead whales?What is it?Where could he be?Not really.Where are we going?It's Sunday. Hey, neither are you!-- Smith's a nice fella, isn't he?A proper gentleman. And such polite company.A lovely fella.I'm not-- I take pride in my work. Unlike yourself.You're looking in the wrong place, Columbo. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 40.Hold it steady.Stop talking to yourself. It's very distracting.Uh huh, great. There's something up here.It's a --Ugh, it stinks like that thing.Oh the Divine Mother of Jesus --Watch out!You broke its nose.So when can they get here? ... Tomorrow? ... And what about the state pathologist?Doctor, we need to know.I can't say that.No, no, don't put me through I've already spoken to -- ugh. Thanks.OK, so what does that mean?Did you show that thing to anyone else before we saw it?We think there might be another one of those things, at least one anyway.Smith said it needs water, right?Whatever. But if it needs water to survive, how could it be moving about on dry land?There's a storm due tonight.I think we've got at least two missing persons. We need to take a look.I didn't say anything.What look?No I didn't.No, I gave you the "I feel embarrassed for you" look. Big difference.What's Smith got to do with your raging alcoholism? Hmm?Uh huh. Of course you are.Lovely.Are we missing some fishermen?My heart! What are you doing?What are you expecting? "Helloooo, 'tis only me."I'm trying!Get your hands off my arse!I swear to God, if you don't stop!Oh shut up.The size of it.Leg it! GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 49.Run!We know.Smith, it's for the best.Shut it off!Is it dead?Ah! Jesus! O'Shea! GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 52.We need to get help.If those eggs hatch, with no whales to eat --What?What have you been eating?Not a tiger.Because Paddy was so intoxicated his blood-alcohol level was toxic.If you want to get that close to it, good luck.How drunk are we talking here?No offence but I don't think my body can handle Paddy levels.And with everyone hammered there's no one in a fit state to call the shots. The non-alcoholic shots.But what's to keep us safe from ourselves, forget what's outside, we could fall over and break our necks trying to conga. Statistics prove put a large number of people in a confined space, ply them with booze and --That's not what it said.You? We'll both do it.I see what you're doing here but have you forgotten you're a dependent alcoholic organising a piss up in a brewery! I'll do it. It'll be easier.OK. But just so you know, I don't drink. I've never even been drunk. I don't know if I can.Ah stop.You charmer. It's true, though.Oh you gotta be joking me!He never liked me as much as her. She was the talented one, Daddy's little girl. That bitch!But I got you guys. I love you all. Even you.I need to pee.Ow.It's a welcome party for me.So it's a goodbye party. Whatever.What's her problem?-- Hey bucko! Where are you going? This party's for your benefit. And all of you are gonna be there too. It's the law! GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 65.And I swear to God I'll arrest any one of you who isn't. Chalk it down!What's your name?Crap. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 66.I dibs the flare gun.I dibs the water pistol. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 67.Tequila!I dunno, you know?C'mere. Listen. Listen. At the end of the day, you know? I dunno. I'm so into you right now. Joke. Kinda.Not enough to fancy you.That's it, is it? You think I think I fancy you. That's the sitchuashun we got, huh?Well I do. So whatcha wanna do 'bout it? Arrest me?Why do you drink so much, Ciarán?Yeah right, and I work everyday 'cause I'm driven.Always chasing them goals, you know? Always chasing. Always running.I feel like I've known you for years. I don't know why.... Yeah. That's true.I'm sorry about your wife, O'Shea. I really am.Una told me, how she died. I'm so sorry.Oh. Ah shite, I'm sorry.... Did you split because ... because of your alcoholickissness?Feck her, O'Shea. If you want I'll find her and do her in for you?Hmm, toast.Git! G'wan! Shag off!Fuck that.Get in.Shite. Get in.Shite!I'm not feeling so good. I need a drink to calm me nerves.I can't drive with you shaking me. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 76.I am arresting you for the murder of Doctor Gleeson. You are not obliged to say anything unless you wish to do so, but whatever you say will be taken down in writing and may be given in evidence.Fuck that.It's eating the jeep.Who wants toast?Grand.You're worse.It's raining.Because of the rain.Don't worry, we have it all under control. There's nothing trying to kill you.And so's his wife.My cat does that, then leaves it on the doorstep as a present.Play hard to get.The Grabber! Not the Grabber- Grabber, the mechanical one! The big yoke, with the arm and the thing and you know? That big aul whatchamacallit you crush things with. The feckin' thing at Cooney's site! What's it called?Exactly! With that thing you could grab it, hoist it up and trap it. It's raining now but it has to stop some time right? And when it does it'd be stuck. Once the sun comes up it'd cook. That'd dry it out.Slow down there. I'll do it.Which is exactly why you'll want the best drunken guard this country's ever seen. Right?Oooh, savage.Got it. Just the keys.I'll be all right. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 93.IT'S OK! I'M ALL RIGHT!Focus.Get off.UH FIRE! FIRE!Would ya come on for fuck sake!I'm breaking so many laws. Drinking on duty. Driving under the influence. Speeding. Driving without lights on.Ah that's better.It's gone.The crusher, the JCB. It's gone. It's not here anymore.Ciarán.What are we gonna do now?I've got an idea too.Why, what are you thinking?Wait! We're not ready!Give me the keys!Got 'em. Shit!Got 'em!-- the wrong keys. It won't open. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 100.... Breaking and entering. Jacking a stolen vehicle ...Get away from him, you --!Cunt.I got you.I think this calls for a celebration.O'Shea!Oh shut your hole.I know!You look like crap.Here.I think I'll take some time-off.Home of the Erin Island Grabbers. It's gonna get mental round here. GRABBERS - Production Draft 28/1/2011 104.You want to get some breakfast?First, lets get out of these wet clothes.
